C-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_0
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_1
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Width -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:WallThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_2
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Girth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_3
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:InternalFilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_1
}
```
